label: Reflect
description: Calculate reflection direction for an incident vector I and surface normal N.

zh.Calculate reflection direction for an in: 计算入射向量 I 和表面法线 N 的反射方向。

data.glsl:
void run(vec2 uv, vec3 i, vec3 n, out vec3 res)   { res = reflect(i, normalize(n)); }
void run(vec2 uv, vec4 i, vec4 n, out vec4 res)   { res = vec4(reflect(i.xyz, normalize(n.xyz)), i.w); }
